albums.title: PRESS PHOTOS
albums.desc: Please feel free to use these photos for press/reviews/adverts/etc.. just include 'The Jays Vintage' and a link to this website or the our facebook page. Click on a photo then click on DOWNLOAD.

photos.cap: The Jays are ready to harmonize for your event x
Our lovely vintage style microphones
Flyer for: 'The Jays Vintage' (Vocal Harmony Group, Bing Crosby/Andrews Sisters Style)
Flyer for: 'Andy B Goode' 1950s/60s Rock n Roll / Swing vocalist

albums.title: THE JAYS VINTAGE
albums.desc: I am also proud to be part of a 1940s Vocal Vintage Tribute Group with some lovely ladies. We sing Andrews sisters, Bing Crosby, Frank Sinatra, Dean Martin style songs.

photos.cap: I'm just leaning on the lamp post...
Fly me to the moon
A Cheeky Jays Shot

albums.title: THE FIRST FEW YEARS
albums.desc: During the first couple of years years we were a 5 piece vocal group. Unfortunately Jen left us due to life/work pressures at the end of 2014. Jane had to retire to pregancy. Although we are a smaller group, change brings new opportunities.

photos.cap: The Jays at Tamworth Castle Grounds
The Jays perform at Tamworth Band Stand
The Jays at Tamworth Castle Grounds amongst the flowers in 2015
The Jays Vocal Vintage Tribute Group from Tamworth Staffordshire

albums.title: TAMWORTH FOOD FESTIVAL
albums.desc: On a beautiful sunny day, we sung to an audience of merry munchers at the Tamworth Gusto Food Festival.

photos.cap: We sang vintage classics from the likes of Andrews sisters, Frank Sinatra and Dean Martin.
Sophie and I sung about 'Eggs in the morning'. You know 'I like them with a kiss'. Luckily so does she.
Memories are made of this. 'Andy B Goode' gave us some Rock n Roll.
Met the Lichfield Town Cryer and his wife after singing at the Food Gusto festival
The Birthday Girl Dressed as a 1920s Flapper
Elaine's Birthday Party
Anne's Birthday Party
What a card

albums.title: VINTAGE FETES / FAYRES
albums.desc: We all love Village Summer Fetes and Vintage Fayres.

photos.cap: Waving the flag at St Pauls Fete. I wasn't the only one who dressed vintage style
Singing by the picturesque Dosthill church
Out together dancing, Cheek to Cheek
Singing with Passion
A Traction engine at Norton Juxta Twycross Summer Fete
A beautiful summers day, with heavy rain showers...of course this is England
A lovely venue to sing, right by the swimming pool
I sang 'Teenager in Love' live on the local radio station TRC FM

albums.title: A VERY VINTAGE CHRISTMAS
albums.desc: Christmas with Andy B Goode and The Jays is always quite special. We have enjoyed performing some Xmas Lights Switch on events at Tamworth and Ashby-de-la-Zouche. Christmas Parties are quite fun when people sing along to classic Xmas songs from their youth.

photos.cap: Christmas with the Jays is full of 1940s nostalgia
The Jays at Ashby Christmas Light Switch on. Boy did it rain, but it was still Christmassy
Singing classic Bing Crosby / Andrews Sisters xmas hits
Posing for the local Tamworth Herald Paper
ONE
FIVE
